sql.name: 添加工单
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_job(id, project_id, machine_box_id, process_person, work_content, status, job_type, creator, create_date) VALUES(':jobId', ':projectId', ':machineBoxId',':processPerson', ':workContent', ':status', ':jobType', ':creator', ':createDate')

sql.name: 获取未处理工单列表
sql.content: SELECT j.id, p.project_number, p.project_name, b.box_number, j.create_date, j.process_person, j.work_content, j.status, j.job_desc, j.job_type, u.user_name FROM t_job j LEFT JOIN t_project p ON j.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN t_machine_box b ON j.machine_box_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON j.process_person = u.id WHERE j.status = 'I' AND j.process_person = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取处理工单列表
sql.content: SELECT j.id, p.project_number, p.project_name, b.box_number, j.create_date, j.process_person, j.work_content, j.status, j.job_desc, j.job_type, u.user_name FROM t_job j LEFT JOIN t_project p ON j.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN t_machine_box b ON j.machine_box_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON j.process_person = u.id WHERE j.status IN('N','F','Q') AND j.process_person = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取项目下用户的工单
sql.content: SELECT j.id, p.project_number, p.project_name, b.box_number, j.create_date, j.process_person, j.work_content, j.status, j.job_desc, j.job_type, u.user_name FROM t_job j LEFT JOIN t_project p ON j.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN t_machine_box b ON j.machine_box_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON j.process_person = u.id WHERE j.project_id = ':projectId'

sql.name: 安装工单处理获取处理器和探测器
sql.content: select p.id, concat('处理器(P)[', p.moxa_number, ']IP地址:') AS device_desc, 'P' AS device_type from t_processor p where exists (select machine_box_id from t_job j where j.machine_box_id = p.machine_box_id AND j.id = ':jobId') union select d.id, concat('P[', t0.moxa_number, ']-探测器NFC号[', d.nfc_number, ']位置描述:') AS device_desc, 'D' AS device_type from t_detector d LEFT JOIN t_processor t0 on d.processor_id = t0.id where d.processor_id IN (select id from t_processor t2 where exists (select machine_box_id from t_job j where j.machine_box_id = t2.machine_box_id AND j.id = ':jobId') )

sql.name: 调试工单处理获取处理器
sql.content: select p.id, p.moxa_number from t_processor p where exists (select machine_box_id from t_job j where j.machine_box_id = p.machine_box_id AND j.id = ':jobId')

sql.name: 更新工单状态
sql.content: update t_job set status = ':status', job_desc = ':jobDesc' where id = ':jobId'

sql.name: 更新处理器IP
sql.content: update t_processor set ip = ':ip' where id = ':processorId'

sql.name: 更新探测器位置描述
sql.content: update t_detector set pos_desc = ':posDesc' where id = ':detectorId'

sql.name: 更新处理器配置文件
sql.content: update t_processor set config_file = ':configFile' where id = ':processorId'

sql.name: 更新处理器探测器信息
sql.content: update t_processor set detector_file = ':detectorFile' where id = ':processorId'

sql.name: 添加工单的安装选项
sql.content: insert into t_job_option(id, job_id, option_name, option_value) values(':id', ':jobId', ':optionName', ':optionValue')

sql.name: 工单完成修改安装工程师确认信息
sql.content: UPDATE t_machine_box m SET m.install_engineer = ':userId', m.confirm_install_date = ':curDate' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT machine_box_id FROM t_job j WHERE j.id = ':jobId' AND j.machine_box_id = m.id)

sql.name: 工单完成修改安装工程师确认信息
sql.content: UPDATE t_machine_box m SET m.debug_engineer = ':userId', m.confirm_debug_date = ':curDate' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT machine_box_id FROM t_job j WHERE j.id = ':jobId' AND j.machine_box_id = m.id)

sql.name: 查询完成的安装工单
sql.content: select id from t_job where machine_box_id = ':boxId' and status = 'F' and job_type = 'A'
